name: goalkeeper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 (in some sports) the player who stands in the team's goal to try to stop the other team from scoring
Examples
For a goalkeeper, it's a great advantage to have big hands.The crowd cheered as the goalkeeper deflected the shot.The goalkeeper denied him his third goal.They're a fairly good team - their only weak link is a relatively inexperienced goalkeeper.The goalkeeper made a great save in the last minute of the match.
